ComicInfo.Summary: Chelsea Nirvana assembles a team of villains to defeat Freak Force once and for all. Barbaric and Ricochet inform the others that Ricochet is pregnant they are happy for her but Rapture warns her of the dangers of carrying a freak baby. After a battle with Bulkhead Star joins the team as their newest member.
ComicInfo.Title: Freak Force
